Source.Name: dive
Source.Summary: A tool for exploring each layer in a docker image
Source.Description: Dive is a tool for exploring a docker image, layer contents, and discovering ways to shrink the size of your Docker/OCI image.

Package.Name: dive
Package.Summary: A tool for exploring each layer in a docker image
Package.Description: Dive is a tool for exploring a docker image, layer contents, and discovering ways to shrink the size of your Docker/OCI image.
